name: Thirty-Free Ten
description:
Thirty-Free Ten The Future Is Now

... and the Nokia 3310 is obsolete. Nobody expected this day to come, but as the final phone from this flagship line had been cast into oblivion, it was finally time to go. This Nokia may now rest in the Hall of Fame.

The Journey to Phonehalla

A travesty occurred on the way to eternal salvation - the Nokia has lost its way! It's up to you to help navigate its way out of the strange  realms and back to the light.

Be wary, as the creatures of these lands may not be so amicable towards those with heavenly wings. Fly onward brave little phone, but know that something much more sinister lurks around the corner...

The Nokia 3310 (Spirit Edition)

As part of its eternal reward, the Nokia had been gifted with new powers - use them to aid you in your path home. The Nokia now has the ability to turn off (and on) to protect itself from malicious currents, but mind the way down!

ActionKeyboardTurn On/Off SpacebarFlyArrow keysCutscene navigationLeft/right arrow keys Credits

Made with love for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3 .

Special thanks to...

  • jsfxr for the easy to use sound effects generator
  • Piskel for being an amazing free pixel art editor
